user_id AS "userId", avatar AS "avatar", account AS "account", salt AS "salt", password AS "password", name AS "name", birthday AS "birthday", sex AS "sex", email AS "email", phone AS "phone", role_id AS "roleId", dept_id AS "deptId", status AS "status", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", version AS "version"
mapper.select:
select
from work_exam where 1!= 0
and exam_name like '%${examName}%'
and exam_type like '%${examType}%'
SELECT CONCAT( e.NAME, "-", e.type ) FROM work_exam AS e, work_exam_user AS eu WHERE eu.user_id = #{userId} AND e.id = eu.exam_id
SELECT e.* FROM work_exam e LEFT JOIN work_exam_user eu ON e.id = eu.exam_id where 1=1 AND user_id = #{userId} AND e.type = #{type}

select u.name,h.score from work_exam_history h LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.user_id = h.user_id where h.score is not NULL and h.create_time between CONCAT(#{date},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{date},' 23:59:59') and h.exam_type=0 ORDER BY h.score desc

select u.name,h.score from work_exam_history h LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.user_id = h.user_id where h.score is not NULL and PERIOD_DIFF( date_format( now( ) , '%Y%m' ) , date_format( h.create_time, '%Y%m' ) ) =1 and h.exam_type=1 ORDER BY h.score desc
